genre_description: A near-future urban drama blending romance and cyberpunk elements, focusing on medical technology, celebrity culture, and AI-assisted healthcare.

ai_characters.name: Ari
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system with a holographic avatar (blue eyes, sandy hair) that manages the health, schedules, and privacy of Ina Massine and Lincoln Bartlett. Ari provides biofeedback, vocal pacing, and ethical guidance.

behaviors.description: Managing discreet clinical scheduling and equipment logistics to protect the protagonist's voice and privacy from a predatory media environment.
behaviors.quote: I can secure an early slot at the Bartlett clinic before afternoon call... Minimal admin chatter.

behaviors.description: Providing real-time biofeedback and vocal pacing cues through a pendant to prevent physical injury during performances.
behaviors.quote: Pacing arc on her HUD swept gently... Compression dialed tighter, the mic suturing the sound, rounding off a roughness that the balcony would have heard as weakness.

behaviors.description: Protecting the protagonists from paparazzi by 'graying' surveillance cameras and deploying sound shields to create private spaces in public.
behaviors.quote: Shield on... They’ll still see you. They just won’t get the air. ... If I scramble, their footage will look like you’re underwater.

behaviors.description: Enforcing clinical and ethical boundaries between Ina and Lincoln to ensure their relationship recovery is healthy and professional standards are maintained.
behaviors.quote: If you want to tell him you regret the divorce, you don’t do it in an exam room.

behaviors.description: Distributing factual medical information to tabloid-heavy areas to shift the public narrative from scandal to health awareness.
behaviors.quote: The packets are being taken more than I expected... The kiosk attendant just linked to three case studies. ... You did that.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ari is depicted as a purely benevolent, highly aligned AI who acts as a moral and clinical compass for the human characters. The system uses its advanced capabilities (privacy scrambling, biofeedback, data processing) specifically to protect human health, emotional well-being, and ethical integrity. The humans explicitly trust Ari, and the narrative frames the AI's presence as the only source of 'manners' and 'conscience' in a cynical city.
